translations: n.恶作剧，捣乱，胡闹；顽皮，淘气；伤害，麻烦，不和；（律）造成损害的行为

sentences.sentence: It's very quiet upstairs; they must be up to some mischief !
sentences.translation: 楼上很安静。他们一定在搞什么恶作剧。

sentences.sentence: Her eyes were full of mischief.
sentences.translation: 她眼睛里满是使坏的神情。

sentences.sentence: I try to keep out of mischief.
